messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a characteristic of a good chase scene?
A good chase is made up of a string of dramatic locations that challenge the characters as they race through them.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of locations do chase scenes typically involve?
Dramatic locations that challenge the characters as they race through them.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why is a chase scene more than just a test of speed?
A good chase is made up of a string of dramatic locations that challenge the characters as they race through them.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are some examples of dramatic locations that might be included in a chase scene?
A crowded marketplace, narrow alleys, a fire escape, breaking through a window, pursuing each other through an apartment.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What makes a chase scene in a game just as dramatic and exciting as combat?
A chase scene should provide just as much drama and excitement as combat.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a key element of a good chase scene in the game?
A good chase is made up of a string of dramatic locations that challenge the characters as they race through them.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How are chase scenes typically structured in the game?
The chase is played out in rounds, similar to combat.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What must be done by a character who is trapped before a chase can ensue?
They must escape before a chase can ensue.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should the Keeper determine first in a chase scenario?
The dice rolls required
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should happen to the situation faced by the next player if a character is trapped?
Change the situation faced by the next player
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary aim of the rules for chases?
Create dramatic fiction
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many parts are the rules for chases divided into?
Five parts
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of these rules for chases?
These rules are intended for characters involved in any type of chase, whether running, swimming or flying, and for vehicles of any kind.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How will the chase proceed if the fleeing character is determined to be fast enough to get away?
The chase will go no further than Part 1.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is covered in Part 3 of the rules for chases?
Part 3 covers the essential rules for movement and for dealing with the various hazards and barriers that might be encountered.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does Part 4 of the rules for chases provide?
Part 4 provides rules for resolving what happens when characters and vehicles try to grab, strike or collide with each other.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines the end of a chase in Part 1?
The fleeing character is determined to be fast enough to get away.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of Part 2?
To provide the Keeper with a system for laying out a chase.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What part covers the essential rules for movement?
Part 3: Movement
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the focus of Part 4?
Resolving conflicts when characters and vehicles collide or interact.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines the end of a chase?
The fleeing character is significantly faster than their opponent
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when the chase ends?
The chase will go no further than Part 1
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the main purpose of Part 2?
To provide the Keeper with a system for laying out a chase
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What part of the chase rules covers movement and hazards?
Part 3: Movement
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when the fleeing character is significantly faster than the pursuer?
The chase is over almost as soon as it has begun.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How are the chases resolved?
The Keeper simply describes how the pursuer loses their quarry in a way that fits the situation.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the result of a single skill roll for each character?
One of two options: the fleeing character is faster than the pursuer, or the pursuer is faster.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when the pursuer is faster than the fleeing character?
The Keeper describes how the pursuer quickly loses their quarry.
